name: prostatectomy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an operation to remove part or all of the prostate (= an organ near the penis that produces a liquid that carries sperm): A laparoscopic prostatectomy is carried out using slender tubes inserted through five small holes in the abdomen.
